name: Finite.of_finite_quot_finite_subgroup
initialProofState:
G : Type u
inst✝² : Group G
H : Subgroup G
inst✝¹ : Finite (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem H x)
inst✝ : Finite (HasQuotient.Quotient G H)
⊢ Finite G
decl:
@[to_additive]
lemma _root_.Finite.of_finite_quot_finite_subgroup {H : Subgroup G} [Finite H] [Finite (G ⧸ H)] :
    Finite G :=
  Finite.of_equiv _ (groupEquivQuotientProdSubgroup (s := H)).symm

name: Finite.of_finite_quot_finite_addSubgroup
initialProofState:
G : Type u
inst✝² : AddGroup G
H : AddSubgroup G
inst✝¹ : Finite (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem H x)
inst✝ : Finite (HasQuotient.Quotient G H)
⊢ Finite G
decl:
@[to_additive]
lemma _root_.Finite.of_finite_quot_finite_subgroup {H : Subgroup G} [Finite H] [Finite (G ⧸ H)] :
    Finite G :=
  Finite.of_equiv _ (groupEquivQuotientProdSubgroup (s := H)).symm
